item.title: Distribute Electron App
item.description: In my last post, Electron with SQLite, I looked into how to set up the electron-sqlite environment. This is just the 0’th step to a proper electron app. In this article I’ll describe how to build a basic package and in future articles, we will talk how to integrate basic web frameworks like webpack, react and typescript. First, lets talk about basic electron stuff. For a basic electron app you will need:
